name: Mary Catherine DANKO v. ERIE INSURANCE EXCHANGE, Appellant; Jeffrey WEAVER v. ERIE INSURANCE EXCHANGE, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

parties: Mary Catherine DANKO v. ERIE INSURANCE EXCHANGE, Appellant. Jeffrey WEAVER v. ERIE INSURANCE EXCHANGE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Orders affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stephen P. McCloskey, Phillips, Faldowski & McCloskey, P.A., Washington, DC, for Erie Ins. Exchange, in No. 8.
